column4: guys after i revived my machine from a potential disk space issue.. any time i try to download a file i get an error like this... "There is not enough room on the disk to save /tmp/DNRtVZ1q.bin.part."
and the / partiton has 537M free still
empty trash. how much free space do you have? maybe burn some cd's and free up more space (like I did).
